By PezCat on Tuesday, April 25, 2000 - 01:23 pm:

Supposedly you can, as I've heard. But I've only heard. In several visits, I've not gotten a 2nd
Fire Feather, though I haven't tried for a 2nd mask, or 2nd Jill Footprint yet.

It's possible to find the monsters on CD though, too. One of my friends has a Phoenix on a CD
of hers... But this is a question I wonder about too...

By Kurasu Soratubo on Saturday, May 6, 2000 - 05:21 pm:

I don't know about the other objects, but I'm almost positive that you _can_ get another Fire Feather. I remember the old board getting that confirmed. It's in a different area than before, though. A statue, I think, rather than a crack in the mountain somewhere.

This is heresay. Until I've bred another expedition monster, I can't be sure, so correct me at will if you know otherwise.
